languages.text: "Ты не отделаешься простой болью. Раз ты не гнушаешься никакой работой, спущенной сверху, на корабле будешь поломоем — в свободное от боевых задач время".
"You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're so willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on, you're going to be a deck swab — when you're not on combat duty."
languages.original_text: "Ты не отделаешься простой болью. Раз ты не гнушаешься никакой работой, спущенной сверху, на корабле будешь поломоем — в свободное от боевых задач время".

traits.locale_text: "You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're so willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on, you're going to be a deck swab — when you're not on combat duty."
"You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're so willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on, you're going to be a deck swab — when you're not on combat duty."
"You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on you're going to be a deck swab — outside your combat duty."
"You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're so willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on, you're going to be a deck swab — when you're not on combat duty."
"You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on you're going to be a deck swab."
"You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on you're going to be a deck swab — outside your combat duty."
"You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're so willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on, you're going to be a deck swab — when you're not on combat duty."

languages.text: « Vous ne vous en tirerez pas avec une simple punition corporelle. Puisque vous semblez prêt à faire tout ce qu'un supérieur vous demande, vous serez désormais de corvée de nettoyage des ponts... quand vous ne serez pas au combat. »
languages.original_text: "You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're so willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on, you're going to be a deck swab — when you're not on combat duty."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne vous en tirerez pas avec une simple punition corporelle. Puisque vous semblez prêt à faire tout ce qu'un supérieur vous demande, vous serez désormais de corvée de nettoyage des ponts... quand vous ne serez pas au combat. »

languages.text: 「ただの痛みで済むと思うな。高位の者から言いつけられた仕事は何でもやるつもりなんだろう？だったらこれからは非戦闘時にデッキ清掃係だ」
languages.original_text: "You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're so willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on, you're going to be a deck swab — when you're not on combat duty."

traits.locale_text: 「ただの痛みで済むと思うな。高位の者から言いつけられた仕事は何でもやるつもりなんだろう？だったらこれからはデッキ清掃係だ」

languages.text: «No se librará de esto solo con dolor. Si va a hacer cualquier trabajo que le ordenen sus superiores, de ahora en adelante fregará cubiertas... cuando no tenga labores de combate».
languages.original_text: "You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're so willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on, you're going to be a deck swab — when you're not on combat duty."

traits.locale_text: «No se librará de esto solo con dolor. Si va a hacer cualquier trabajo que le ordenen sus superiores, de ahora en adelante fregará cubiertas... cuando no tenga labores de combate».

languages.text: “别以为简简单单受苦就够了。既然无论上面的人让你做什么，你都那么愿意照做，那从现在开始，战斗之外的时间你就负责清洗甲板吧。”
languages.original_text: "You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're so willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on, you're going to be a deck swab — when you're not on combat duty."

traits.locale_text: “别以为简简单单受苦就够了。既然无论上面的人让你做什么，你都那么愿意照做，那从现在开始，战斗之外的时间你就负责清洗甲板吧。”

languages.text: "Öyle işkenceyle filan kurtulamazsın. Üstlerinin verdiği her işe razıysan bundan böyle çatışmada olmadığın her saniye güverteyi sen temizleyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're so willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on, you're going to be a deck swab — when you're not on combat duty."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle işkenceyle filan kurtulamazsın. Üstlerinin verdiği her işe razıysan bundan böyle çatışmada olmadığın her saniye güverteyi sen temizleyeceksin."

languages.text: "Mit bloßem Schmerz kommt Ihr mir nicht davon. Nachdem ihr gewillt seid, jeden Auftrag der Obrigkeit anzunehmen, werdet Ihr ab sofort das Deck schrubben ... sofern Ihr nicht im Kampfeinsatz seid."
languages.original_text: "You won't get off with simple pain. Since you're so willing to do any job handed down from on high, from now on, you're going to be a deck swab — when you're not on combat duty."

traits.locale_text: "Mit bloßem Schmerz kommt Ihr mir nicht davon. Nachdem ihr gewillt seid, jeden Auftrag der Obrigkeit anzunehmen, werdet Ihr ab sofort das Deck schrubben ... sofern Ihr nicht im Kampfeinsatz seid."
